message.content:
Ewe, ndiyazama ukunciphisa yonke imibuzo akho ngesiXhosa. Ndibhalisa iskripthi yokunceda wena. 

1. Ukunika indlela yokufaka i-email yakho:

- Hlela kubhokisi ye-email yakho.
- Faka ucingo lwakho kubhokisi elisendlulayo.
- Faka i-email address yakho kubhokisi elisendlulayo.
- Faka i-subject yakho kubhokisi elisendlulayo.
- Faka umlayezo wakho kubhokisi elisendlulayo.
- Hlela kubhokisi yokusendela ucingo lwakho.

2. Ukunceda umntu okanye umntwana wakho ukudla:

- Hlela kubhokisi yokudla ezindaweni zokudla.
- Thola incwadi yokudla emgqumeni wendawo.
- Hlela kubhokisi ekutya ucingo lwakho.
- Faka izinto ezifunekileyo kubhokisi elikhoyo.
- Hlela kubhokisi yokuphosa amanzi.
- Phila ngezinto ezifunekileyo ucingo lwakho lithenge amanzi.

3. Ukunceda umntu okanye umntwana wakho ukufunda:

- Hlela kubhokisi yokufunda.
- Thola incwadi yokufunda emgqumeni wendawo.
- Faka izinto ezifunekileyo kubhokisi elikhoyo.
- Hlela kubhokisi yokuthi ucingo lwakho lubambelele.
- Khetha incwadi esifunekayo ucingo lwakho lufunde ngayo.

Nceda ndibhalise imibuzo yakho ngendlela emnye ukuba ndikhokhele.
